amendment.description: Amendment expresses the sense of Congress that State Department employees who, in the course of their duties, inform Congress of pertinent facts concerning their responsibilities, should not as a result be demoted or removed from their current position or from Federal employment.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, no. 30, printed in Part B, H.Rept. 106-235 to express the Sense of the Congress that State Department employees who, in the course of their duties,inform the congress of pertinent facts concerning their responsibilities, should not as a result be demoted or removed from their current position or from Federal employment.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Stearns amendment (A016) Agreed to by recorded vote: 287 - 136 (Roll no. 325).
